data.title: Exit Games Inc.
data.meta_description: Exit Games, founded in January 2003 in Hamburg, Germany, is a leading service provider for mobile entertainment software. Their core product Exit Games Neutron connects mobile gamers all over the world. The open multiplayer solution is based on the OMA...
data.text: Exit Games, founded in January 2003 in Hamburg, Germany, is a leading service provider for mobile entertainment software. Their core product Exit Games Neutron connects mobile gamers all over the world. The open multiplayer solution is based on the OMA Games Service industry standard, co-developed by Exit Games. Customers of Exit Games include leading telecommunication enterprises such as Com2uS, Vodafone, T-Mobile, Orange and SonyEricsson. The company was founded with the participation of venture capital and maintains branches in Hamburg, Germany as well as in San Francisco, California/USA.
